content.detailedDescription:
It was nine thirty at night and i was outside on my back patio. i have made it a habit to watch the sky and the treelines with my digital nightvision monocular.. i like to observe the wonders of the universe and with nv you can see stars that you normally cannot.  i was scanning the north when i heard the roar of what i knew to be a fighter jet.  we have a big usaf base here and i have gotten used to seeing and hearing various jet fighter aircraft.  
so i am scanning the sky trying to find the strobes on the fighter jet i am hearing when i pan to the left, which is west, and notice a very bright star.  i continue panning to my left.. looking south.. then i move back to my right because it has become obvious to me that the sound cannot be in that direction. as i do i notice that that bright star isn't exactly where it was before.  i must admit that it is surreal when something that your mind has acknowledged as staionary suddenly isn't.  the things was moving..Or so i thought it was... so i moved close to my privacy fence gate and lined up the object with a stationary reference point to see if it was indeed moving.. it was... i grabbed my droid and selected pictures at 4x zoom. i shot six images through the digital night vision device as i watched in awe as this huge white "thing" - which by now obviously wasn't a star - slowly ease across the sky..Totally silent which only added to the extreme creepiness of the situation.
it moved towards me (easterly direction) then made a gentle 90 degree arc moving south.  i kept it in my viewfinder when suddenly it was gone.  i could not reacquire it.  it just vanished.
i wanted to go and grab the wife, pull her outside and show it to her but i was afraid she wouldn't see it or maybe it would be gone any second.. or maybe disturbing her while she's watching tv wouldn't be a prudent thing to do..<g>
content.summary: Brightly lit star began moving, flew overhead in gradual arc turned south then disappeared

content.summary: Brightly lit star began moving, flew overhead in gradual arc turned south then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I do not recall hearing any strange noises, though i am used to hearing rumbles due to my proximity to a major street in my town.  many trucks  rumble by late at night.  it was a strange night to start.  before getting in the bed it appeared as though the moon and stars were in the wrong location in the sky.  i dismissed it because i usually do not track such things...It just felt out of place.  anyway, i was in my bed and i saw something just walk through the wall from outside.(i live on the second floor) it looked sorta like a floating pale double "s".  it was strange...I dismissed this too and decided it was due to my exhaustion.  it was at this point that i felt like someone else was in the room with me.  i woke up my girlfriend and told her...She just rolled over and went back to sleep almost immediately. i attempted to go back to sleep but this being got right in my face...As if testing to see if i could detect it.  i could not see it fully...Mainly like a ghostly outline and some facial features.  it was hunched over so i estimate that it may have stood around 3 to 4 feet tall.  it had an oblong shaped head with huge eyes.  i could only see an outline of the creature...It was invisible mostly.  as it was almost directly infront of my face, my right eye began to feel strange...As if i just got over a migraine headache...But it only felt uncomfortable on the right eye.  it sort of looked like a zeta type being or gray alien...But it was smaller than i would expect and it appeared much skinnier.  i didnt feel threatened by it but it did startle me when it got right in my face..It appeared as though i was walking through the object (my dog's kennel) right next to my bed to get in my face.  i asked it to leave and it did...Needless to say i did not sleep very well last night. not out of fear, just perplexed.
content.summary: This was not a ufo but a someone in my bedroom

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a friend were driving towards hudson ohio from twinsburg ohio at approximately 1030 pm sunday evening heading south on state route 91. as we were approaching hudson we noticed in the sky 6-8 red lights in the sky in a formation in the sky. as we spend up to find a pull off so we could get our cameras out to take some pictures the lights seemed to know we were coming so they started to flicker out. as we got to a pull off and stopped the car the lights went bring again and started to go out one by one. the last light to go off went off then flickered on again and then disappearing. or so we thought. as we went to hudson to take some photos of the city i couldnt help but shoot some photos of the sky after what had transpired. so i began shooting some time lapse shots when i caught what i thought was a shooting star. well upon further investigation at home i seem to have caught the red lights again with some white lights mixed in this time which wasnt seen before, plus one red light which is venturing from the clustered formation of red lights. this is my first time seeing anything in the sky and first time using this website. if you guys have any questions please feel free to contact me. i will say the cluster of lights i am referring to is on the right side of the picture between the clouds. if you would like the full picture size please email me and i can get it to you for further examination.
content.summary: Pulsating lights that went out without any rhyme or reason.

content.detailedDescription: My husband, 8 year old daughter, and i were in lachine, mi at my husbands uncles house on june 22, 2012. this is a small town about 1/2 hr away from alpena in northern lower mi. we were there to patch up some holes on the eves where bats were going in and had a nest. it was dusk and we were waiting for the all bats to fly out before we patched the holes. my husband seen a object and he pointed to it. it was moving very slow coming towards us and it was black. it was about 3 telephone poles higher then the tree line. the place we was at was very wooded and surrounded by nothing much but farms and fields, it was a very quiet night. this object made no noise and moved slower then a bird. i thought it must be a huge bird he's showing me but as it got closer i seen it had no movement just slowly floating across the sky! it was bigger then a human..Almost as if a person could fit inside of this small thing? or a large creature kinda hunched over? i don't know how else to decribe it. i instantly got the feeling something wasn't right about this thing cause nothing moves like this. we got a good minute or so to look at it as it moved in front of us and we couldn't figure out what this thing was. we coulden't make out any detail on it. nothing on it was moving. it wasnt a bird, plane, ballons, or anything we have ever seen. it gave me the creeps just seeing this strange thing move so unnatural. my daughter kept asking me what is it? i had no idea what to say. it continued to go past us and never went higher or lower just perfectly straight across till it disapeard behind the tall trees out of our sight. went baack there the next night but didn't see it.
content.summary: Weird dark figure/creature slowly moving across the sky above the trees

content.detailedDescription:
We were heading to fontana park in buchanan county iowa. we were a few miles south of the park when my son started asking "what is that? look at that!" he said it was a ufo. i was driving and couldn't immediately see the object but i was skeptical. then my wife saw the object out the passenger window. she said, "oh wow, what is that?"

i still thought they were messing around, but my wife told me to pull the car over. i got onto the nearest gravel road, and i guess we were facing east when i turned onto the road. i stopped the car and got out and looked in the direction they were pointing. there was an object sort of sitting about ten feet up above the power lines. it was mostly white with not lights on it. there was an orange/rust-colored tinge to it around the bottom and along the back of its far side. it made no noise and there were no wings, no exhaust trail. i didn't feel panicked, but i felt surprised that i was actually seeing this thing. it was clearly not a helicopter or an airplane or a balloon, which were the first three things i tried to rule out in my mind. 

i leaned into the car to get the phone from my wife to take a picture of the object, but when i stood up, the object was gone. my wife and son said that it began to move to the south, following the path of the power line, and then it simply flicked off, or disappeared. i did not see this happen, but the object was there one second and gone the next.

we tried to follow it and backtracked off the dirt road and south on the highway for a few miles in the direction we'd come from. we didn't see it again.

after going to the park, as we took the 45 minute drive home, we tried to rule out anything it could have been. i've never seen anything like it. it was not a disk or a saucer shape, but really a sort of egg shape. absolutely weird.
content.summary: Driving to fontana park in buchanan county. son saw object, then wife. pulled over, watched it disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two of my sons were sky watching when a silvery saucer or diamond shaped craft appeared from the northwest heading toward the west fairly fast. because of the surrounding trees we could only observe a few seconds of it's passing. it made a very loud growling/hovercraft-like/jet-like sound as it traveled very low considering it's size. my son, a veteran, said it sounded like a fighter jet but it didn't look anything like one.
we don't know what what this object was but we think it made two passes 15-20 minutes apart following the same exact flight pattern.
if it's a military vehicle what the heck is it doing in a residential neighborhood at 11:00p.M.? and if it wasn't military...What was it?
we lost site of the object when it's flight pattern placed it behind a neighbor's pine tree.
content.summary: A large diamond or saucer shaped craft appeared twice within 20 minutes. it made a furocious sound, had many white lights around it's exterior and had a red light on the top of it.

content.detailedDescription:
Hover triangle with lights over se san francisco 062512

took this photo of a strange triangle with 3 lights hovering silently over se san francisco.
photo taken from 947 folsom street, evening of 062512 at around 8.30pm
content.summary: Hover triangle with lights over se san francisco 062512

content.detailedDescription: There was something that looked like a orange looking sphere that was hovering next to mars. it moved east, then west, then moved in a straight line to where mars is and then moved up in the sky then came back down. i then turned east of the horizon and looked up and right above my house were multiple triangle formations. i brought ny mother and my husband outside so they could see it and one certain triangle had 3 bright points that seem to move slowly with one redish/onge. i went back inside the house because i begfelt paranoid alike someone or something was watching me and after what i saw tonight, i don't believe that we are alone!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Went outside to look at the stars and when i turned to observe the moon. a lil ways away from the moon was mars but...

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 10:50pm est, myself and my fiance walked outside to his car before he left for work.  we were walking out, and he looked in the sky, and noticed strange lights.  they were towards the se, and unsure of how high in the sky.  they were formed in a triangle, and all moving slowly in that formation to the east.  they were red, in color and were pulsating/flickering like a star.  they were only visible for a few mins, (i'm unsure how long before we went outside).  my fiance snapped a quick picture with his camera phone, then ran inside to get the camera.  i looked away for a second, and looked back, and one light had disappeared.  he came back out with the camera, but the other two lights moved into a line, one above the other, and both disappeared.  we were unable to get another picture with the digital camera.  the pic included is zoomed in on a camera phone.  the lights appear to be double on each light, but they were not.  that is from his hand possibly moving when taking the picture.  the orange light to the right is from a street light.  once the lights were gone, there was no trace of them, and i did not see them again.  there was no noise or anything in the sky.
content.summary: Strange lights in waterford, mi.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard letting my dogs do their evening business before bed.  kitchen lights were on behind me, and i turned them off to help my night vision and observe the dogs better.  when turned the lights out, i noticed in the sky traveling from the south to the north between 20 and 30 lights traveling in various formations.  some diamonds.  some triangles and some squares.  they were moving at the same speed in the same direction.  tried to capture with my cell pone but lights were too weak to capture at all under the circumstances.  and knowing my reputation for jokes, i immediately sought witnesses.  my wife and two neighbors all observed.  there was no noise coming from the objects.  difficult to determine distance but they seemed to be a good distance away.  they gained altitude and disappeared into the cloud cover.  cannot imagine what the lights were.  maybe military?  but that can be the only explanation.  lights remained constant.  o blinking or pulsing.  just solid red or orange.  the lights seemed almost like a convoy.  lights would come into view and then disappear into the clouds.  in total could have number 30-40, but between 20 and 30 were visible at any one time.
content.summary: Observed 20-30 lights in the sky traveling south to north from backyard.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of the sighting, i was going to my car to run the garbage down to the dumpster in our gated community.

i noticed the object immediately.

large ball/circle shaped object. very bright with faint red and green lights on either side. very large object that at first i thought was a star until it came closer. this object actually passed overhead (i'd say it was 500 or more feet above me. then the object seemed to just disappear into thin air, moving north to south. 

i was stunned after realizing that it wasn't a plane, helicopter, comet or meteor. i had a sense of awe. i just stood there and watched it fly overhead. i couldn't believe my eyes.

the object just disappeared.
content.summary: Large bright ball shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of the sighting, i was going to my car to run the garbage down to the dumpster in our gated community.

i noticed the object immediately.

large ball/circle shaped object. very bright with faint red and green lights on either side. very large object that at first i thought was a star until it came closer. this object actually passed overhead (i'd say it was 500 or more feet above me. then the object seemed to just disappear into thin air, moving north to south. 

i was stunned after realizing that it wasn't a plane, helicopter, comet or meteor. i had a sense of awe. i just stood there and watched it fly overhead. i couldn't believe my eyes.

the object just disappeared.
content.summary: Large bright ball shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I was by my house walking my dog. i looked up at the sky when i saw a strage ball of orange light. it was moving a a bit of a fast speed. at first i thought it was a satellite,but there was one in the sky and the light looked nothing like it. plus the light was too large, or perhaps close, to be a satellite. it seemed to be moving from southeast to northwest. i just completely freak out because i had no clue what i was looking at. i had my aunt come outside because i thought i was just imagining it,but she told me she saw it. eventually the light was too far for me to see. then a second light apeared about 2 minutes after the first. it did the same thing as the first but was red on the outer part and orange in the middle(the first was just orange). im still not sure what it was,but hopefully i will get some answers.
content.summary: Strange figures of orange light

content.detailedDescription: I was by my house walking my dog. i looked up at the sky when i saw a strage ball of orange light. it was moving a a bit of a fast speed. at first i thought it was a satellite,but there was one in the sky and the light looked nothing like it. plus the light was too large, or perhaps close, to be a satellite. it seemed to be moving from southeast to northwest. i just completely freak out because i had no clue what i was looking at. i had my aunt come outside because i thought i was just imagining it,but she told me she saw it. eventually the light was too far for me to see. then a second light apeared about 2 minutes after the first. it did the same thing as the first but was red on the outer part and orange in the middle(the first was just orange). im still not sure what it was,but hopefully i will get some answers.
content.summary: Strange figures of orange light

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the swing and noticed it appear from the north and i told my husband, do you see that. he said what is that, what is that, what is that, etc.... we were shocked. never seen anything like it before. it was there for about twenty seconds and just diminshed in size to a black dot and was gone. unbelievable, we would of never believed something like that was out there, until we both saw it together. i am so glad he was there. i may of thought i was hallucinating.
content.summary: Large red ball shape, huge. then faded into a tiny black ball and was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
Supplemental video for our june 15, 2012 sighting
case #:   39442
*note:  the video is best viewed using a large hdtv in a dark room.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in three rivers, michigan, united states on june 15th 2012‏

content.detailedDescription: i took my binoculars to a beach near my home on cape cod to stargaze. the sky had a low lying cloud cover so not many stars to see, i watched the ferries going in and out to the islands and other occasional seafaring traffic.  as i was facing the ocean ( south-east) over my left shoulder i see something coming in from a north west direction.  it's length looked to be about the size of a telephone pole or larger(i noticed that as it coasted over a pole)was square, flat but somewhat curved on the top part. underneath in each corner were green lights that did not blink ,in the middle on the bottom were red and white lights that flashed on and off extremely quickly while rotating in a circular fashion very quickly. the body of the object was a dull grey with indistinct edges. it was a sight to behold that took my breath away!.As i was on a private beach next to the large public beach there was no one else around to say  "did you just see that? "...Anyway as to it's direction...It came in over the utility poles maybe about 12 feet above them (there is a row of poles  lining the beach) i'm looking at this in my binoculars ( it is probably a mile or two away from me) ...And it just glides horizontally, slowly heading toward the ocean at about the speed of a glider. it came in (leading with the corner ?)and within a few seconds slowly turns (away from me) the bottom lifting up so that i can see that it's square, and now seems to lead with it's side as it curves slowly in a big semi-circle over the shallow part of the ocean.After traversing (maybe a mile?)it becomes horizontal to the ground again and heads back from the direction it came (north-west.) there is a radio tower that lines up with the row of poles and it flew around that and then i couldn't see it any more because of trees. the whole event took just a few minutes, was the speed and movement of a glider, no sound or emission , seemed to stay the same height to the ground the whole time.  i ran to my car to write down and draw the details then i kept looking with my binoculars again..Approx. 10 minutes later the whole thing happens again!! i go back to check my drawing and notes (since i got another look) for accuracy..Then i wait around some more "just in case"... not thinking it could happen again..And it does!!!..Approx. another 10 minutes later. i wait around along time after but nothing like that happensthe whole thing happened between approx 10:30 and 11:00pm .  this really blows my mind and i'm not sure who i can talk to about this!
content.summary: Telephone pole length, square, flatish,dull grey body with unblinking green lights in corners & red & white lights flashing & rotating quickly in  circular fashion. all lights on bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
Triangle-shaped craft observed just to the south of gatesville, texas.

on june 6, 2012, at approximately 0525 hours and while traveling northbound on highway 116 just north of the city of pidcoke, i had a ufo sighting. i had observed the object as i entered the south side of pidcoke a few minutes earlier.

at that point, i thought it was just an airplane. all i could see was a white light to the left side of the highway. i noticed the object move to the right side of the highway.

as i barely passed the north side of pidcoke, i saw the object much more clearly. it moved back to the left side of the highway in a zig-zag motion.

at this time, i realized this was not an airplane. it was a triangle-shaped craft with three very bright white lights underneath the craft. the lights were so bright, that i could clearly make out the triangle shape of the craft.

the craft was either moving very slow or virtually stationary in the air. it was flying at a relatively low elevation. the craft also had some sort of beam or scanning l! ight in the front of it that was moving back and forth in a horizontal motion at about a 45 degree angle from the craft.

as i passed the craft, i looked back and it disappeared. pidcoke is a small town in between copperas cove and gatesville.

i did manage a quick photo of the object with a cell phone.
content.summary: Triangle-shaped ufo observed to the south of gatesville, texas

content.detailedDescription: At a driving range in town with a friend when i noticed and pointed out a small object in distance, high in sky. the object had no apparant features, but clearly was not a conventional aircraft as we were in flight path of 3 different major airports and at one point a passenger jet passed through our line of sight of the object giving us a clear comparison. the object appeared to be very high, very slow moving and eventually we just lost sight of it. was one of 3 seperate unknown sighting within a 48 hour period within a 100mile radius.
content.summary: Saw object very slowly move up and away/out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
i was making a delivery to san antonio, texas on saturday, june 23, 2012 at approximately 4:40 pm. traveling on highway 35 near exit 175 marker when i noticed a silver like cone to my left. i didn't think anything of it so i rolled down the window assuming it was glare from the window. when i did i noticed it was still there. it was around 150 feet from the ground and wasn't moving. the color was like that of a milk truck, silver like. i watched it for about 5 minutes. it lowered a bit then shot straight up in the air. 

this was a scary feeling as i am a skeptic and i immediately called my wife to tell her what i had seen. i was confused because my brain couldn't register what i had seen.
content.summary: Silver sphere that hovered then shot straight up on hwy 35 new bransful texas

content.detailedDescription:
I took this picture from a fixed position with a fixed lens (50mm) late at night in my backyard, the aperture was open for 1.6 seconds. what looks like it might be two "headlights" when blown up, might also just be a reflection from the moon. i did not see it with my eyes as i was just trying to take a time-elapsed pic of the stars. all i know is that it's not a plane, helicopter or weather-baloon and that "it" is doing a lot in 1.6 seconds like being in two stopped positions--one closer and one farther back from where i was. the original pic just appears as a little light streak that goes across 40% of the frame and that you've seen many times before, but---because of the pro-sumer hi-def camera used and it being in a fixed position--when you blow it up it clearly looks like an amazing circular craft caught at both a stand-still position and in motion. here it is: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]  and here: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

note: all the info i filled out on this form is based on the image i linked to. i did not see the craft with my own eyes but i can verify and prove that whatever it is, it's the real deal; the photo was not altered in any way shape or form---i only made copies to crop and reverse horizontally and vertically. i have the original camera i used and the old laptop i uploaded it to.


the camera information at the site i linked to above is incorrect regarding the date and time of photo, the correct camera info is listed below (taken from http://www.Adoramapix.Com where i originally uploaded the photo file which was about 34mb's):

camera	nikon d700
exposure	1.6 sec (16/10)
aperture	f/
exposure mode	manual exposure
exposure bias	0/6 ev
white balance	auto white balance
flash	not fired
focal length	50 mm
compression	no compression
color space	srgb
date & time	2010:11:18 00:33:19
date & time (digitized)	2010:11:18 00:33:19
file size	13.9 mb
image width	2704 pixels
image height	1800 pixels

i will be putting an article up on headlinezoo.Com and would be happy to provide the image files to muffon if they are interested in analyzing and validating it to the extent possible. please feel free to contact me to discuss.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I took this amazing picture from a fixed position with a fixed lens (50mm) late at night in my backyard, the aperture was open for 1.6 seconds. you can see the craft stop at two fixed positions and you can see it traveling fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside facing north smoking around 11pm looking at stars it was pretty clear. outside. a few clouds i noticed. a cloud tha.T was moving right towards me when the other clouds. were stationary that's when it really caught my attention as it came closer. i noticed three boomerang shaped crafts no lights they would fade in and out of cloud likeness and then reappear. i was in shock because they were big but i was trying to rationalize what i was seeingthey appear. and then fade out they were headed southwest
content.summary: Three boomerang shaped crafts with cloud likness

content.detailedDescription: There were two of us stopped at gas station for fuel, second person went into gas station and i remained on outside on the other end of parking lot where there was a rest area...The ship came over top of tree line and moved very slow in what seemed to be in slow motion with no sound, no air movement and very low...Had a cat in vehicle which responded by acting out and finding itself on the dash board...It had a large red globe in the center bottom of craft with white lights on each end of triange...At the rear end of triangle there were 5 lights about the size of a large end of a 55 gallon drum which were  stationary lites...It was black in color with grids on the bottom of the craft that seemed to be closed with no sound or air movement...It was very close to tops of trees which the trees showed on leaf or branch movement...It was moving in slow motion over me and continued to move in a se direction and disappeared...During observation i had turned to look at the gas pump site to see if anyone else was seeing what it was...People seemed to be unaware of it overhead...I felt as though time had slowed down and could not move but was thinking about what i was seeing...I did not see any windows or doors on craft...No exhaust was observed...I could not see top of craft and cannot established height of craft from bottom to possilbe top...The reason i looked up was i was streching from driving and had raised my arms above my head and looking at the night sky which very clear and dark with stars before the ship appeared moving overhead...
content.summary: Large triangle shape, large red light glob shaped in center bottom, 3 bright lites at each corner same size, 5 smaller light at rear end as it passed, made no sound or moved air around trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I was young, i wasn't in school yet so it must have been 1969. we lived in the country of belle vernon. the house my mother grew up in. i woke up in the morning and went looking for my mom. i went from my room, walked through the adjioning room (sewing room) to head to my parents room. but something stopped me and i looked towards the window of the sewing room and saw hovering outside the window a silver/metallic disk. the disk hovered, it appeared to be rotating but stayed in the same position. then the disk changed position suddenly, it darted to a new position hovered and changed position again.
the disk - silver/metallic, reflected light. small in size approx. dinner plate size. disk had contour to its shape, there was a point in the center like it came to a peak. it seemed more like i was looking down on it can't remember seeing the bottom of the disk. the disk hovered and rotated at same time. changed position with quick darting movements.
the house was a 2 story home built on the side of a hill over looking a road, down to a creek, then the elevation went steep up to an abandoned slag dump and railroad tracks. the window from which the ufo was observed overlooked this view.
i don't remember what happened next. i just remember the disk outside the window.
my mother tells a story of one evening is a young girl while helping my grandmother take down clothes from the line. they observed a craft flying along the top of the slag dump and suddenly changed direction and flew up and off into the sky. there was no sound.
my mother also commented that when we moved from that house the window to the sewing room had developed a haze to it, it had an opalesence like it had been exposed to high heat, but the lower windows did not.
content.summary: Observed silver disk hovering outside 2nd story window

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i sitting at camp fire looking at stars. wife sees it first and draws my attention to it. never seen anything like it before. had no idea what it was. very large and bright moving slowly n to s. about 30 seconds to it fadding to a red dot and vanishing. no trail. amazed at seeing something so unidentifiable. i have seen meteors and comets before.
content.summary: Moving at speed of satalite, very large, faded to red dot then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter called from work about 1/2 mile away and said she thought she saw a ufo hovering and asked me to go out and look.

from our 4th floor parking garage i soon saw a very large, silent airplane leaving no trail nor noise until it passed westward and thought that may have been what she had seen.

i decided to go to the ground level and search upward . . . there were 4 or 5 airplanes circling and then i saw this large shiny orb higher up than any of the airplanes in the exact location my daughter described.

a plane landed at a nearby airport, others kept circling and the ufo hovered in the one location for a number of minutes, then started to glide se. as i remembered i had my camera, i looked down for a second, turned it on and when i looked back up it was nowhere in site.

i waited a few minutes and it did not reappear. it was visible for 15-20 minutes at least.

it was over and se of broomfield and perhaps over western westminster, co as well.
content.summary: Brightly shining, hovering, silent orb that would go horizontal and vertical

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room watching the t.V. off to my left i saw a bright flash of orange light which lead to me seeing a massive hovering orange light in the sky off to the north east. at first i believed it was the moon or an airplane as living near washington d.C i see plenty of aircraft fly by in that exact same location. the object measured anywhere from 700 to 900 feet wide, perfectly circular, stationary, light brightly orange bright enough to light up my entire backyard and several other buildings around my house, after about 12 minutes the object emitted a bright white light that shown to the ground not sure where my view was obstructed by several other houses.Then after emitting the beam the light slowly faded away till it was completely gone. the light at first made me fell terrified of it but then i just felt as if as it was supposed to be there.
content.summary: Large hovering orange light.
